description:
In Mazinger Z, Koji has ultimate power. But he has no idea how to control it, and the consequences of this are shown in blood. Koji will have to shake his uncertainty soon, as the awful might of Dr. Hell`s Mechanical Beasts descends on him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fierce Battle! Mechanical Beasts vs. Mazinger
激戦! 機械獣VSマジンガー
